alert.note: Alert for Knox (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 4:26PM EDT until May 19 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL BELL AND CENTRAL KNOX COUNTIES... At 425 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Swanpond, or over Barbourville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Boone Heights around 430 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bimble, Hinkle and Barnyard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
